verses.kjv: For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I shall bring again the captivity of Judah and Jerusalem,
verses.web: “For, behold, in those days, and in that time, when I restore the fortunes of Judah and Jerusalem,
verses.ct: "Look — in those days and at that time, when I restore the fortunes of Judah and Jerusalem,

verses.kjv: I will also gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat, and will plead with them there for my people and for my heritage Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations, and parted my land.
verses.web: I will gather all nations, and will bring them down into the valley of Jehoshaphat; and I will execute judgment on them there for my people, and for my heritage, Israel, whom they have scattered among the nations. They have divided my land,
verses.ct: I will gather every nation and bring them down to the valley of Jehoshaphat. There I will put them on trial for what they did to my people, my inheritance Israel. They scattered them among the nations and carved up my land.

verses.kjv: And they have cast lots for my people; and have given a boy for an harlot, and sold a girl for wine, that they might drink.
verses.web: and have cast lots for my people, and have given a boy for a prostitute, and sold a girl for wine, that they may drink.
verses.ct: They cast lots to divide my people among themselves. They traded a boy for a prostitute and sold a girl for wine to drink.

verses.kjv: Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O Tyre, and Zidon, and all the coasts of Palestine? will ye render me a recompence? and if ye recompense me, swiftly and speedily will I return your recompence upon your own head;
verses.web: “Yes, and what are you to me, Tyre, and Sidon, and all the regions of Philistia? Will you repay me? And if you repay me, I will swiftly and speedily return your repayment on your own head.
verses.ct: "And what do you think you're doing, Tyre, Sidon, and all you regions of Philistia? Are you trying to pay me back for something? If you are, I will turn your payback on your own heads — swiftly and without delay.

verses.kjv: Because ye have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried into your temples my goodly pleasant things:
verses.web: Because you have taken my silver and my gold, and have carried my finest treasures into your temples,
verses.ct: You took my silver and my gold and hauled my finest treasures into your temples.

verses.kjv: The children also of Judah and the children of Jerusalem have ye sold unto the Grecians, that ye might remove them far from their border.
verses.web: and have sold the children of Judah and the children of Jerusalem to the sons of the Greeks, that you may remove them far from their border.
verses.ct: You sold the people of Judah and Jerusalem to the Greeks, dragging them far from their homeland.

verses.kjv: Behold, I will raise them out of the place whither ye have sold them, and will return your recompence upon your own head:
verses.web: Behold, I will stir them up out of the place where you have sold them, and will return your repayment on your own head;
verses.ct: But watch — I will bring them back from wherever you sold them, and I will turn your payback on your own heads.

verses.kjv: And I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hand of the children of Judah, and they shall sell them to the Sabeans, to a people far off: for the LORD hath spoken it.
verses.web: and I will sell your sons and your daughters into the hands of the children of Judah, and they will sell them to the men of Sheba, to a faraway nation, for LORD has spoken it.”
verses.ct: I will hand your sons and daughters over to the people of Judah, and they will sell them to the Sabeans, a nation far away. The LORD has spoken."

verses.kjv: Proclaim ye this among the Gentiles; Prepare war, wake up the mighty men, let all the men of war draw near; let them come up:
verses.web: Proclaim this among the nations: “Prepare for war! Stir up the mighty men. Let all the warriors draw near. Let them come up.
verses.ct: Announce this among the nations: "Prepare for war! Rouse the warriors! Let every fighting man step forward and advance.

verses.kjv: Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruninghooks into spears: let the weak say, I am strong.
verses.web: Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruning hooks into spears. Let the weak say, ‘I am strong.’
verses.ct: Hammer your plowshares into swords and your pruning hooks into spears. Let even the weak say, 'I am strong.'

verses.kjv: Assemble yourselves, and come, all ye heathen, and gather yourselves together round about: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O LORD.
verses.web: Hurry and come, all you surrounding nations, and gather yourselves together.” Cause your mighty ones to come down there, LORD.
verses.ct: Hurry — come, all you surrounding nations, and gather together." LORD, send your mighty ones down to that place.

verses.kjv: Let the heathen be wakened, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat: for there will I sit to judge all the heathen round about.
verses.web: “Let the nations arouse themselves, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat; for there I will sit to judge all the surrounding nations.
verses.ct: "Let the nations stir themselves and march to the valley of Jehoshaphat, because that is where I will sit in judgment over every surrounding nation.

verses.kjv: Put ye in the sickle, for the harvest is ripe: come, get you down; for the press is full, the fats overflow; for their wickedness is great.
verses.web: Put in the sickle; for the harvest is ripe. Come, tread, for the wine press is full, the vats overflow, for their wickedness is great.”
verses.ct: Swing the sickle — the harvest is ripe! Come and trample the grapes — the winepress is full and the vats are overflowing, because their wickedness is enormous."

verses.kjv: Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision: for the day of the LORD is near in the valley of decision.
verses.web: Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision! For the day of LORD is near, in the valley of decision.
verses.ct: Crowds upon crowds fill the valley of decision! The day of the LORD is near in the valley of decision.

verses.kjv: The sun and the moon shall be darkened, and the stars shall withdraw their shining.
verses.web: The sun and the moon are darkened, and the stars withdraw their shining.
verses.ct: The sun and moon go dark, and the stars stop shining.

verses.kjv: The LORD also shall roar out of Zion, and utter his voice from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth shall shake: but the LORD will be the hope of his people, and the strength of the children of Israel.
verses.web: LORD will roar from Zion, and thunder from Jerusalem; and the heavens and the earth will shake; but LORD will be a refuge to his people, and a stronghold to the children of Israel.
verses.ct: The LORD roars from Zion and thunders from Jerusalem; the heavens and the earth shake. But the LORD is a refuge for his people and a stronghold for the children of Israel.

verses.kjv: So shall ye know that I am the LORD your God dwelling in Zion, my holy mountain: then shall Jerusalem be holy, and there shall no strangers pass through her any more.
verses.web: “So you will know that I am LORD, your God, dwelling in Zion, my holy mountain. Then Jerusalem will be holy, and no strangers will pass through her any more.
verses.ct: "Then you will know that I am the LORD your God, living in Zion, my holy mountain. Jerusalem will be holy, and foreigners will never overrun her again.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the mountains shall drop down new wine, and the hills shall flow with milk, and all the rivers of Judah shall flow with waters, and a fountain shall come forth of the house of the LORD, and shall water the valley of Shittim.
verses.web: It will happen in that day, that the mountains will drop down sweet wine, the hills will flow with milk, all the brooks of Judah will flow with waters, and a fountain will flow out from LORD’s house, and will water the valley of Shittim.
verses.ct: When that day comes, sweet wine will drip from the mountains, milk will flow from the hills, and every stream in Judah will run full of water. A spring will pour out from the house of the LORD and water the valley of Shittim.

verses.kjv: Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence against the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
verses.web: Egypt will be a desolation, and Edom will be a desolate wilderness, for the violence done to the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
verses.ct: Egypt will become a wasteland, and Edom will turn into an empty desert — because of the violence they committed against the people of Judah, shedding innocent blood in their land.

verses.kjv: But Judah shall dwell for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
verses.web: But Judah will be inhabited forever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
verses.ct: But Judah will be inhabited forever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.

verses.kjv: For I will cleanse their blood that I have not cleansed: for the LORD dwelleth in Zion.
verses.web: I will cleanse their blood, that I have not cleansed: for LORD dwells in Zion.”
verses.ct: I will avenge the blood of my people that has not yet been avenged. The LORD dwells in Zion."
